context.text: List of Academy Awards ceremonies - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
Annual Ceremony Date of Ceremony Year Honored Host Best Picture
The Academy Awards, USA at the Internet Movie Database

This is a list of Academy Awards ceremonies complete with date of each event, year in film , ceremony host, and the Best Picture award winner. The latest event was the 80th Academy Awards ceremony held on February 24 , 2008 .

entity.htmlSnippet:
